snippet: South Africa claimed an unconvincing 22-6 victory over Italy on Saturday with a late try from Bryan Habana adding some respectability to a lacklustre performance in Padova....

headline.print_headline: Sloppy Springboks Battle Past Brave Italy
headline.main: Sloppy Springboks Battle Past Brave Italy

lead_paragraph: South Africa claimed an unconvincing 22-6 victory over Italy on Saturday with a late try from Bryan Habana adding some respectability to a lacklustre performance in Padova.
